channel.title: 200 max stat and 255 max combat wtf?
channel.description: Hi on a source i recently downloaded the max stats are 200 and the max combat is 255, How can i fix it so the max combat is 126 and the max stat is 99, This is a 317 source.

item.title: 200 max stat and 255 max combat wtf?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Bow To Me, post:11, topic:294934”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=390026.msg2912507#msg2912507 date=1250191575]

client class.

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= #; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return #;
}[/code]

Change both #s to 99.

Ty Chassy I Love you

I love him more (in a non-gay way)

don’t spam…
[/quote]
You’re adding to the spam.[/quote]

that’s great.

Read full topic
item.source: 200 max stat and 255 max combat wtf?
